About me

Hello everyone! I'm Katya, and my task here is to show the beauty of Ukrainian and Russian languages and the countries as well :)

I'm an open person who likes to find new friends, new places and of course new emotions. When you ask me to tell some facts about me, hm... so, it's unbelievable when all people, whom I meet, can change my mindset and share something new with me. I appreciate the rarity and unusualness in languages, countries, thoughts, people. And I hope you'll tell me much cool stuff about your culture!

And I believe that the person is alive only in that case when understands her/himself.

Photogallery

School's comment

The methods, pace, materials, language skills and teaching process in general are all suited to the individual needs of a learner and are addressing the target of a person directly. My style is flexible and easily adjustable e.g. by putting emphasis on small talk or a 3-day business negotiation based on "The Art of Winning" by H. A. Mills, or comprehensive reading of "Red Riding Hood" to thorough analysis of "The Economist"/BBC Finance. It is all tailored neatly to your personal needs.
